actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Office of Personnel Management should provide vocational rehabilitation services in its administration of the civil service disability retirement program.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Office of Personnel Management should advise those civil service disability annuitants who could benefit from vocational rehabilitation of the programs available to them.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Office of Personnel Management should provide vocational rehabilitation services in its administration of the civil service disability retirement program.
